Data.text_description:
The probability of rainfall being high (A=1) is 0.7196. 
The probability of wheather condition being high (B=1) is 0.5778. 
For those with wheather condition being low (B=0) and rainfall being low (A=0), the probability of work-life balance being high (C=1) is 0.4464. 
For those with wheather condition being low (B=0) and rainfall being high (A=1), the probability of work-life balance being high (C=1) is 0.2136. 
For those with wheather condition being high (B=1) and rainfall being low (A=0), the probability of work-life balance being high (C=1) is 0.1987. 
For those with wheather condition being high (B=1) and rainfall being high (A=1), the probability of work-life balance being high (C=1) is 0.0771. 
For those with work-life balance being low (C=0), the probability of physical health being high (D=1) is 0.2391. 
For those with work-life balance being high (C=1), the probability of physical health being high (D=1) is 0.3580.
